about_the_game:
Raise a glass to Sever Games! This DLC is a simple way of showing support for the developers of ‘The Feast’!

All the funds gathered this way will be put towards our future projects.

We hope that you enjoyed ‘The Feast’! Thanks for all your support!

- Sever Team

content_descriptors.notes: The Feast contains elements and images of violence that may be disturbing to some audiences.
